lead_paragraph: Whether you are a budding photographer trying to get a foothold in the profession, or a veteran looking for new challenges, The Fourth Annual New York Portfolio Review could provide the break you’re looking for. And it’s free — because we think that it’s the quality of the work that matters, not how much money you can pay.
abstract: Once again, an intense weekend of critiques, conversation and community will take place at the Fourth Annual New York Portfolio Review. It’s free, but spaces are limited, so apply now.
snippet: Once again, an intense weekend of critiques, conversation and community will take place at the Fourth Annual New York Portfolio Review. It’s free, but spaces are limited, so apply now....

headline.main: Seeking Applications for the 2016 New York Portfolio Review
